database.name: VIEW HRIS_EMPLOYEE_V
database.view: SELECT c_bpartner.c_bpartner_id AS hris_employee_v_id, c_bpartner.ad_client_id, c_bpartner.ad_org_id, c_bpartner.created, c_bpartner.createdby, c_bpartner.updated, c_bpartner.updatedby, c_bpartner.c_bpartner_id, (c_bpartner.value || '-') || c_bpartner.name AS employee, c_bpartner.isactive FROM c_bpartner WHERE c_bpartner.isemployee = 'Y'
